verse.name: v1
verse.lines: On Jordan's stormy banks I stand, And cast a wishful eye To Canaan's fair and happy land, Where my possessions lie.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I am bound for the promised land, I am bound for the promised land; O who will come and go with me? I am bound for the promised land.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All o'er those wide-extended plains Shines one eternal day; There God, the Son, forever reigns And scatters night away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: No chilling winds, nor pois'nous breath Can reach that healthful shore; Sickness and sorrow, pain and death Are felt and feared no more.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When shall I reach that happy place, And be forever blest? When shall I see my Father's face and in His bosom rest?
